event.description: Erick Aybar singles on a fly ball to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Howard Kendrick singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Pridie. Erick Aybar to 2nd.
Albert Pujols doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Jason Pridie. Erick Aybar scores. Howard Kendrick to 3rd.
Torii Hunter strikes out swinging.
Vernon Wells singles on a ground ball to center fielder Coco Crisp. Howard Kendrick scores. Albert Pujols scores.
With Alberto Callaspo batting, Vernon Wells steals (1) 2nd base.
Alberto Callaspo flies out to left fielder Jason Pridie.
Chris Iannetta grounds out, second baseman Jemile Weeks to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Peter Bourjos pops out to third baseman Josh Donaldson in foul territory.
Hank Conger grounds out, second baseman Jemile Weeks to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Erick Aybar walks.
Pitcher Change: Carlos Hernandez replaces Brad Peacock.
Howard Kendrick homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Erick Aybar scores.
Albert Pujols singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Pridie.
Torii Hunter lines out to second baseman Jemile Weeks.
Pitcher Change: Grant Balfour replaces Carlos Hernandez.
Vernon Wells lines out to left fielder Jason Pridie.
Alberto Callaspo singles on a ground ball to right fielder Michael Taylor.
Chris Iannetta homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Alberto Callaspo scores.
Peter Bourjos singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Pridie.
With Hank Conger batting, Peter Bourjos caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Kurt Suzuki to shortstop Cliff Pennington.
Hank Conger walks.
Erick Aybar walks. Hank Conger to 2nd.
Howard Kendrick walks. Hank Conger to 3rd. Erick Aybar to 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Fautino De Los Santos replaces Grant Balfour.
Albert Pujols flies out to right fielder Michael Taylor.
Pitcher Change: Sonny Gray replaces Fautino De Los Santos.
Torii Hunter singles on a ground ball to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Vernon Wells walks. Torii Hunter to 2nd.
Alberto Callaspo singles on a ground ball to right fielder Michael Taylor. Torii Hunter to 3rd. Vernon Wells to 2nd.
Chris Iannetta walks. Torii Hunter scores. Vernon Wells to 3rd. Alberto Callaspo to 2nd.
Peter Bourjos out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Coco Crisp. Vernon Wells scores. Alberto Callaspo to 3rd.
Hank Conger strikes out swinging.
Erick Aybar grounds out, second baseman Jemile Weeks to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Pitcher Change: Blake Treinen replaces Sonny Gray.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Alexi Amarista replaces Howard Kendrick.
Alexi Amarista reaches on throwing error by shortstop Cliff Pennington. Alexi Amarista to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jorge Cantu replaces Albert Pujols.
Jorge Cantu flies out to left fielder Jason Pridie.
Torii Hunter strikes out swinging.
Vernon Wells flies out to right fielder Michael Taylor.
Pitcher Change: Pedro Figueroa replaces Blake Treinen.
Defensive Substitution: Tyler Ladendorf replaces second baseman Jemile Weeks, batting 1st, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Cedric Hunter replaces center fielder Coco Crisp, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Andrew Romine walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jett Bandy replaces Chris Iannetta.
Jett Bandy hit by pitch. Andrew Romine to 2nd.
Ryan Langerhans grounds out, shortstop Cliff Pennington to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue. Andrew Romine to 3rd. Jett Bandy to 2nd.
Hank Conger reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Cliff Pennington to catcher Kurt Suzuki. Andrew Romine out at home.
Kole Calhoun strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Derek Norris replaces catcher Kurt Suzuki, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Evan Scribner replaces Pedro Figueroa.
Alexi Amarista flies out to center fielder Cedric Hunter.
Jorge Cantu strikes out swinging.
Efren Navarro grounds out, second baseman Tyler Ladendorf to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Rosales replaces shortstop Cliff Pennington, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Doug Deeds grounds out, pitcher Evan Scribner to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Andrew Romine flies out to center fielder Cedric Hunter.
Alberto Rosario grounds out, shortstop Adam Rosales to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue.
Stephen Parker remains in the game as the third baseman.
Grant Green remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Josh Bowman replaces Evan Scribner.
Ryan Langerhans walks.
Hank Conger grounds into double play, second baseman Tyler Ladendorf to shortstop Adam Rosales to first baseman Kila Ka'aihue. Ryan Langerhans out at 2nd.
